com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages

Enum TextBlockFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<TextBlockFont>
      • com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages.TextBlockFont
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<TextBlockFont>

    public enum TextBlockFont
extends java.lang.Enum<TextBlockFont>

    Enumeration of font types for the Microsoft Band text block layout element

    For the available characters for the small and medium fonts, see the visual guidelines at http://developer.microsoftband.com/docs/MicrosoftBandExperienceDesignGuidelines.pdf

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      EXTRA_LARGE_NUMBERS
      A value representing the Microsoft Band's extra large font, which only supports numbers and a few select other characters
      EXTRA_LARGE_NUMBERS_BOLD
      A value representing the Microsoft Band's extra large bold font, which only supports numbers and a few select other characters
      LARGE
      A value representing the Microsoft Band's large font, which only supports numbers and a few select other characters
      MEDIUM
      A value representing the Microsoft Band's medium font
      SMALL
      A value representing the Microsoft Band's small font
